welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Cedar Mill, a charming city known for its beautiful nature trails and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland Airport houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The south terminal at Portland Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time or data limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Portland International Airport houses the ticketing counters, baggage claim, and a variety of shops and restaurants.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A primarily serves domestic flights and includes a variety of shops, restaurants, and a Delta Sky Club lounge.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights and includes a variety of shops, restaurants, and a United Club lounge.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves domestic flights and includes a variety of shops, restaurants, and a Alaska Airlines Board Room lounge.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for up to 4 hours per day.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mal Airport serves domestic flights within Papua New Guinea.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but the signal may be weak in some areas.
